explains: adj. 易管理的；易控制的；易办的

sentences.en: The small, manageable size of Bishop's body of work has facilitated its extraordinary critical reception since her death.
sentences.cn: 自毕晓普去世以来，由于她的作品体积小、易于管理的特点，毕晓普受到了非同寻常的批评。

sentences.en: The debt has been reduced to a more manageable level.
sentences.cn: 债务减到了比较能够应付的程度。

sentences.en: He will now try to cut down the task to a manageable size.
sentences.cn: 他现在将尽力把任务缩减到能应对的程度。
